Blackfang: You have to get all the drones to the ground, but beware!
if they hear you coming, they'll flee away. You'll have to be sneaky.

He pressed a button on the wall monitor and five small drones exited
the base and went into hiding in the forest.

Blackfang: Let's play then!

--- In nbwrpg@yahoogroups.com, "raccoon7679" <raccoon7679@y...> wrote:
> Cam::
> 
> She hopped around in fox mode. "Yeah. I can play that. How do I play 
> it again? Catch all the drones? Sounds great. Let's play then."  and 
> with that, she took off like a shot down the hallway and towards the 
> main enterence.
> 
> 
> --- In nbwrpg@yahoogroups.com, "Nic" <Proudwing500k@h...> wrote:
> > OOC: Oops! I forgot Blackfang yesterday!
> > 
> > Bic:
> > 
> > Blackfang tought for a moment. He wanted to make her play but also 
> to
> > train her. How could he do both? Then, it dawned on him.
> > 
> > Blackfang: That could be a great idea. I have a great game in mind.
> > Let's call it "Catch the drone". I'll send five drones in the forest
> > and you'll have to capture them. How about it?
> > 
> > --- In nbwrpg@yahoogroups.com, "raccoon7679" <raccoon7679@y...> 
> wrote:
> > > Cam::
> > > 
> > > She transformed into fox kit mode and started to nip at 
> Blackfang's 
> > > heels. "Wanna play?"
